TopicTitle: Squadcast Summary for 2015-04-18 - Picture Perfect Edition!

Articles.Content:
**Post-merge edit: See ObsessedWithKSP's Squadcast Summary here:** [**Link**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115866-Squadcast-Summary-for-2015-04-18-Picture-Perfect-Edition%21?p=1843450&viewfull=1#post1843450)

Pictures released from the 4/17 SQUADCAST:

1. We saved the Lifesaver! Here's the new Xenon tank

![6pAlfA5.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6pAlfA5.jpg)

2. Here's it on a craft:

![NDFBvXW.png](http://i.imgur.com/NDFBvXW.png)

3. Some new wings! - With fuel capacity!

![tby5gyY.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/tby5gyY.jpg)

4. Some new intakes! - I'm a big fan of these personally.

![7gfvOKf.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/7gfvOKf.jpg)

5. New cargo bays! - note that the central beam has been removed by RoverDude since this image was released.

![XL1VKUx.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/XL1VKUx.jpg)

6. Heatshields!!

![jNFCnBN.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/jNFCnBN.jpg)

7. Mining Asteroids!

![VjYaPql.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/VjYaPql.jpg)

8. Let's take a closer look at that snou... I mean, drill!

![ujlQmNY.png](http://i.imgur.com/ujlQmNY.png)

9. Stock fairings! I love the textures, but the separation IMO could be cleaner. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

![c4Jub1i.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/c4Jub1i.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-18T19:20:46Z" title="04/18/2015 07:20  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 18, 2015</time> by Avera9eJoe**

Oooh, 2 and 3 look pretty cool. Although the wings are a bit thick by themselves... maybe they have fuel in them? ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

And YES, I know SQUADCAST is going on as I type this. I'm too lazy to watch it alright
Finally, I can stop suffering and build that Space Shuttle.

I love all of it!

Especially the in-line cargo bays... Time for actual Service Modules, huh?

That's so awesome!! I've been wanting round cargo bays ever since they introduced the funny-shaped space-plane bays (since I hate space planes). Although, even I admit the new intakes look cool. I may have to revisit planes once the new aero is in. Heat shields look really nice too, as does the mining.

Ooooh, mining on asteroids? Woohoo!

I wonder if catching some in Kerbol orbit would be useful for grand tours. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Woohoo! Make sure you add the picture of the fairings and the mini ships in the VAB ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Plus, Max said the physics bubble around ships has been increased 10 times! More collisions! Kessler syndrome! Yes!

The ROUND-8 is staying, service modules, new songs, intakes, and heat shields?

YEEEEEEEEEEEEEEESSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS!!!

> 
> Oooh, 2 and 3 look pretty cool. Although the wings are a bit thick by themselves... maybe they have fuel in them? ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)
> And YES, I know SQUADCAST is going on as I type this. I'm too lazy to watch it alright

Those wings are the small tips or canards as I take it. They also hold fuel in them. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Cargo bays rule, although I hope it's possible to fit the materials bay inside the 2.5m one. I think i'd like it better without that center column (although that could be useful for radially attaching things maybe).

Also, what about heat shields for spaceplanes? Or will they be naturally more heat-resistant and not need ablative coating?

Could someone explain what was said about the round-8 fuel tank? and something about a yellow one.

Good that SQUAD listened to the community.

Max really posted a LOT of stuff today. So much that it is clear that 1.0 is really near release ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) For heavens sake, he even loaded 1.0 live to show the diference in load times ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Songs? Oops. I'm on mobile, auto correct thinks wings are songs.

> 
> 1. We saved the Lifesaver! Here's the new Xenon tank
> [http://i.imgur.com/wR7RRlY.png](http://i.imgur.com/wR7RRlY.png)

We would have thought they would have made a recolor of the Round-8, and they went a step further

> 
> 2. Some new wings!
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/gGgtn78.png](http://i.imgur.com/gGgtn78.png)

They are... er.... intresting looking?

> 
> 3. Some new intakes!
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/bU15FFX.png](http://i.imgur.com/bU15FFX.png)

They look nice and worn actually.

> 
> 4. New cargo bays!
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/5j4lSbC.png](http://i.imgur.com/5j4lSbC.png)

I see potential uses, but the middle beam will ruin alot of stuff. If it has to be there, but the third cargo bay seems to say there will be a version without one.

> 
> 5. Heatshields!!
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/UM9eLkd.png](http://i.imgur.com/UM9eLkd.png)

I am guessing decouplers under heatshields are similar to decouplers under engines.

> 
> 6. Mining!
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/Z9cA38x.png](http://i.imgur.com/Z9cA38x.png)

So, apparently meteors are mineable soon.

> 
> Cargo bays rule, although I hope it's possible to fit the materials bay inside the 2.5m one. I think i'd like it better without that center column (although that could be useful for radially attaching things maybe).
> Also, what about heat shields for spaceplanes? Or will they be naturally more heat-resistant and not need ablative coating?

You know, I wonder if spaceplane parts will have ablative coating on the bottom of them. That would add to realism. The black coating model on the bottom already fits with the idea!

> 
> They are... er.... intresting looking?

Those wings are actually wet wings and hold fuel! Super rad.

So for use with the Mk.3 parts we get:

- bigger wings (and yes, they carry fuel)

- bigger gear

- bigger intakes

That somehow feels like what's now missing would be a bigger engine...?

I love all of the new parts, the equipment bays are awesome!

Thanks, SQUAD, for listening to the Round-8 fanclub!
I just saw the pic live with no audio, but I'm really not sure about the fairing.... Are they really going to have every pieces get separated? Seems a bit silly....

What is going on in this image?

If I 'draw' a nice rounded fairing made of a lot of points, will I get dozens of bits flying off when I separate?

![JPlu0o9.png](http://i.imgur.com/JPlu0o9.png)

:blush:dat intake tho 

but really, we need 2.5 meter jets

I love all of these pictures! We get even fuel cells? This update is literally fulfilling my entire wishlist. The texture on the heatshields is beautiful, not a undetailed black surface like I was expected.

> 
> I love all of these pictures! We get even fuel cells? This update is literally fulfilling my entire wishlist.

Hmm? Fuel....Cells?

> 
> I see potential uses, but the middle beam will ruin alot of stuff. If it has to be there, but the third cargo bay seems to say there will be a version without one.

As far as I understood Maxmaps, these are not cargo bays, but *equipment* bays. Meant for a lot of the small stuff that was previously radially attached (batteries, science instruments, etc.) but can now be placed in these things so it doesn't burn up on reentry.

> 
> What is going on in this image?
> If I 'draw' a nice rounded fairing made of a lot of points, will I get dozens of bits flying off when I separate?
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/JPlu0o9.png](http://i.imgur.com/JPlu0o9.png)

and you will probably have a lot of parts in it... so yeah, better install procedural fairings mod.

Yees! Heatsheilds!

But shouldn't the MK1 command pod get built in heatshield, given that it has a shield-y bottom texture?

And given r4pt0r's picture, I think I'll stick with wing fairings.
cargo bays - lovely!
